column4: kor9999_: get rid of windows, it will simplify things for you. then troubleshoot linux, and when you get it right, you'll laugh ever time bill gates is seen.
kor9999_: the only thing linux ISN'T good at is video games, but that's what big screen tv's and ps3's/xbox/wii are for
